name: Burst of Radiance
components: V, S, M/DF (a piece of flint and a pinch of silver dust)
text: This spell fills the area with a brilliant flash of shimmering light. Creatures in the area are blinded for 1d4 rounds, or dazzled for 1d4 rounds if they succeed at a Reflex save. Evil creatures in the area of the burst take 1d4 points of damage per caster level (max 5d4), whether they succeed at the Reflex save or not.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (一片燧石和一撮银粉)
savingThrow_zh: 反射, 通过则部分生效; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术把目标区域笼罩在耀眼的闪光中。区域内生物目盲1d4轮，反射豁免成功目眩（dazzled）1d4轮。邪恶生物遭到每施法等级1d4点伤害（最高5d4），无论是否豁免成功。
